name: Handlebar Wraps
description:
They are finally here! A hand-stitched handlebar wrap for the uncompromising cyclist. Our 5 oz. vegetable-tanned leather is the thickest wrap you will find anywhere. Not only will our thick wrap give way to your hands' memory, it will be the longest lasting wrap you will ever own. As always, our leather is sourced from St. Louis' own Hermann Oak Leather.

For Saint Louis locals shipping charges are waived if you would like to drop off and pick up at our Locust Street address.

For those shipping the bars, you will be required to pay shipping to us but we will gladly ship them back to you on our dime. You're welcome.

Shipping Address:
3005 Locust Street
St. Louis, MO. 63103

Made in the USA.

name: Toe Straps
description:
Like your father's baseball glove or your grandfather's watch, we've found that old tools often outlast and outperform the new. We believe in quality. We don't believe in fixing things that aren't broken. These toe straps are a timeless tool to secure your feet for your commuting pleasure. 

Our vegetable tanned leather is sourced from the oldest tannery in the Midwest (Hermann Oak), which just so happens to be located across town. 

Made in the USA.

**Note: Allow one week processing time.
(FREE SHIPPING)

name: The Lindell
description: New life for vintage frames - a steel horse customized to your specifications. Please contact us using the link to the left for orders and estimates. Best, Kameron Less is more. The Lindell is a straightforward, no-frills ride for cyclists who demand both bomb-proof construction and elegance. Features a flip-flop hub, Brooks B17 Saddle and Brooks handlebar tape.

name: The Jefferson
description: New life for vintage frames - a steel horse customized to your specifications. Please contact us using the link to the left for orders and estimates. Best, Kameron The Jefferson features our own hand-stitched handlebar wrap, straps for toes and saddle carry, and hand-stitched top tube protector - all made from locally-sourced Hermann Oak leather. The saddle is a Brooks B17 Select in matching natural color.
